original_text: Judah also did not keep the commandments of the Lord their God, but walked in the customs that Israel had introduced.
korean_text: 유다도 그들의 하나님 여호와의 명령을 지키지 아니하고 이스라엘 사람들이 만든 관습을 행하였으므로

sentences.original_text: Judah also did not keep the commandments of the Lord their God
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 또한 그들의 하나님 여호와의 계명을 지키지 않았다

sentences.original_text: but walked in the customs that Israel had introduced
